reset-password.title: Reset password
reset-password.description:
Please enter your email address.
 You will receive an email with a link to a password change form.
reset-password.send-email-success: The link has been sent to the mail
reset-password.send-email-text: We have sent a password reset link to your email address: <emailLink>{{ email }}</emailLink>

set-password.title: Set new password
set-password.invalid-link-description: We're sorry, but the password reset link you followed is no longer active or is invalid.
set-password.step-invalid-title: This could happen for several reasons:
set-password.step-invalid-used: The link has already been used.
set-password.step-invalid-withdrawn: The request to change the password has been withdrawn.
set-password.success-description: You can now use your new password to log in.
set-password.step-success-title: Tips for keeping your account secure:
set-password.step-success-share: Do not share your password with others.
